original_text: Then David came to meet Araunah. When Araunah saw David, he came out from the threshing floor. He bent down low in front of David, with his face towards the ground.
korean_text: 다윗이 오르난에게 나아가매 오르난이 내다보다가 다윗을 보고 타작 마당에서 나와 얼굴을 땅에 대고 다윗에게 절하매

sentences.original_text: Then David came to meet Araunah.
he came out from the threshing floor.
He bent down low in front of David,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다윗 앞에서 깊이 몸을 굽혔다.

sentences.original_text: with his face towards the ground.
